headline: Nordson Corporation Announces Medical and Fluid Solutions Segment Leadership Transition
summary: WESTLAKE, Ohio, April 28, 2025--Justin Hall promoted to Executive Vice President (EVP) and Medical and Fluid Solutions (MFS) segment leader.
